languages.text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
At the end of their turn, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

languages.text:
その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終わりに、堕落した貴族は血を探すか恐れの効果を探すのいずれかが有効な状態で最も近いサーヴィターに移動する。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。
そのような効果を持つサーヴィターがいない場合、堕落した貴族はその場に留まる。
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
そのターン終了時に堕落した貴族は、血を探すまたは恐れを探すのいずれかが有効な最も近いサーヴィターに移動する。この移動は機会攻撃を誘発しない。
そのような効果を持つサーヴィターがいない場合、堕落した貴族はその場に留まる。

languages.text:
腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会移动到拥有“渴求鲜血”或“渴求恐惧”效果的机仆身边。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
如果附近没有这样的机仆，腐化贵族就不会移动。
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，会移动到拥有“渴求鲜血”或“渴求恐惧”效果的机仆身边。此次移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
如果附近没有这样的机仆，腐化贵族就不会移动。

languages.text:
Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el noble corrupto se mueve hasta el servidor más cercano que tenga activo el efecto de Buscar sangre o el de Buscar miedo. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
Si ningún servidor tiene estos efectos, el noble corrupto permanece inmóvil.
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el noble corrupto se mueve hasta el servidor más cercano que tenga activo el efecto de Buscar sangre o el de Buscar miedo. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
Si ningún servidor tiene estos efectos, el noble corrupto permanece inmóvil.

languages.text:
Am Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} bewegt sich der verdorbene Adlige zu dem nächstgelegenen Servitor, bei dem der Effekt "Suche nach Blut" oder "Suche nach Angst" aktiv ist. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.
Wenn es keine Servitors mit solchen Effekten gibt, bleibt der verdorbene Adlige an Ort und Stelle.
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
Am Ende seines Zuges bewegt sich der verdorbene Adlige zu dem nächstgelegenen Servitor, bei dem entweder der Effekt Suche nach Blut oder Suche nach Angst aktiv ist. Diese Bewegung provoziert keine Gelegenheitsangriffe.
Wenn es keine Servitors mit solchen Effekten gibt, bleibt der verdorbene Adlige an Ort und Stelle.

languages.text:
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu se déplace vers le servitor le plus proche dont l'effet Détection du sang ou Détection de la peur est actif. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
En l'absence de servitor disposant de tels effets, le noble corrompu reste à sa place.
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu se déplace vers le servitor le plus proche dont l'effet Détection du sang ou Détection de la peur est actif. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
En l'absence de servitor disposant de tels effets, le noble corrompu reste à sa place.

À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le noble corrompu se déplace vers le servitor le plus proche dont l'effet Détection du sang ou Détection de la peur est actif. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
En l'absence de servitor disposant de tels effets, le noble corrompu reste à sa place.

languages.text:
В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оскверненный дворянин перемещается к ближайшему сервитору, на которого действует эффект "в поисках крови" или "в поисках страха". Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
Если сервиторов с такими эффектами нет, дворянин остается на месте.
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.

traits.locale_text:
В конце своего хода оскверненный дворянин перемещается к ближайшему сервитору, на которого действует эффект "в поисках крови" или "в поисках страха". Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.
Если сервиторов с такими эффектами нет, дворянин остается на месте.

В конце своего хода оскверненный дворянин перемещается к ближайшему сервитору, на которого действует эффект "в поисках крови" или "в поисках страха". Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.
Если сервиторов с такими эффектами нет, дворянин остается на месте.

languages.text:
Yoz soylu, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde kan peşinde veya korku peşinde etkilerine sahip en yakındaki hizmetöre doğru hareket eder. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
Bu etkilere sahip hiç hizmetör yoksa yoz soylu, olduğu yerde kalır.
languages.original_text:
At the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the corrupted noble moves to the nearest servitor with either the searching for blood or searching for fear effect active. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
If there are no servitors with such effects, the corrupted noble stays put.
